txt.en: Rhawn needs help finding their lost tome. It should be in Radlaw in a location overlooking the Wadewater.
You have found Rhawn Torlan's lost tome.\n\nYou should bring it back to Rhawn Torlan in Clegur.

'Ah yes! That's the one! The Path of the Light! This is quite a rare book and I'm so grateful that you were able to find it.

'Are you perhaps familiar with this story? It's a tale of mighty warriors from beyond the twinkling night sky vanquishing evil where it hides. They wield blades of dazzling light. It's rather far-fetched, but the adventures these warriors go on is quite fascinating!

'Perhaps not. It's not a story just anyone reads. Again, a rare legend.'
Rhawn Torlan has lost their favourite spot to look over the Wadewater.

'Hello there! Don't mind me. I've only lost the best spot to read my books. I used to look upon the Wadewater's still current and reflect leisurely, until those ruffians in Radlaw moved in.

'Now, I have been resigned to reading under this post. Actually, I was wondering if you could help me? I had to leave my spot in a hurry and I lost one of my favourite books in the shuffle.

'Could you perhaps find it for me? Oh, and if you don't mind... teach those ruffians a lesson while you're at it.

'Radlaw is to the north. It should be easy to find, as it neighbours the Wadewater.'
'Radlaw can be found to the north, now go teach them a lesson!'
